[9/22/2016 5:30:26 PM] SMSP Comviva: mysql> select day,address as short_code,sum(success_count),sum(failure_count),sum(redirect_count),sum(success_count)+sum(failure_count)+sum(redirect_count) as total,((sum(success_count)+sum(redirect_count))*100)/(sum(success_count)+sum(failure_count)+sum(redirect_count)) as "Succ%" from account_statistics where msg_type=2 and substr(day,1,4)='2015' group by day order by day limit 10;

[11/16/2016 5:29:45 PM] Rufin Dji: how the live statistics works
[11/16/2016 5:30:11 PM] SMSP Comviva: there is a udp script for that..
[11/16/2016 5:30:49 PM] Rufin Dji: ok
[11/16/2016 5:38:21 PM] SMSP Comviva: for p2p :
[11/16/2016 5:38:23 PM] SMSP Comviva: select LTRIM(RTRIM(day)) as "Date",LTRIM(RTRIM(hour)) as "Hour",LTRIM(RTRIM(sum(success_count))) as "Success Count",LTRIM(RTRIM(sum(failure_count))) as "Failure Count",LTRIM(RTRIM(sum(success_count+failure_count+redirect_count))) as "Total", LTRIM(RTRIM(cast((sum(success_count+redirect_count)*100)/sum(success_count+failure_count+redirect_count) as decimal (10,2)))) as "Succ %" from main_statistics where msg_type=1 and day like '2016-11-16%' group by day,hour order by 1,2
[11/16/2016 5:38:27 PM] SMSP Comviva: for p2a :
[11/16/2016 5:38:37 PM] SMSP Comviva: select LTRIM(RTRIM(day)) as "Date",LTRIM(RTRIM(hour)) as "Hour",LTRIM(RTRIM(sum(success_count))) as "Success Count",LTRIM(RTRIM(sum(failure_count))) as "Failure Count",LTRIM(RTRIM(sum(success_count+failure_count+redirect_count))) as "Total", LTRIM(RTRIM(cast((sum(success_count+redirect_count)*100)/sum(success_count+failure_count+redirect_count) as decimal (10,2)))) as "Succ %" from main_statistics where msg_type=2 and day like '2016-11-16%' group by day,hour order by 1,2
[11/16/2016 5:38:40 PM] SMSP Comviva: for a2p :
[11/16/2016 5:38:48 PM] SMSP Comviva: select LTRIM(RTRIM(day)) as "Date",LTRIM(RTRIM(hour)) as "Hour",LTRIM(RTRIM(sum(success_count))) as "Success Count",LTRIM(RTRIM(sum(failure_count))) as "Failure Count",LTRIM(RTRIM(sum(success_count+failure_count+redirect_count))) as "Total", LTRIM(RTRIM(cast((sum(success_count+redirect_count)*100)/sum(success_count+failure_count+redirect_count) as decimal (10,2)))) as "Succ %" from main_statistics where msg_type=3 and day like '2016-11-16%' group by day,hour order by 1,2
